body.name: Dish Drying Rack - Expandable Dish Rack for Kitchen Counter, Large Dish Drainer with Pan Holder, Stainless Steel Dish Strainer with Cup Holder and Utensil Holder, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 37 mins
features: [Expandable Design] The dish drying rack pull to expand the drainboard from 16.9 to 26.8 inches for more drying space when needed. Dish drainer rack dimensions:16.9"-26.8" (L) x 12.2" (W) x 6" (H)

[New-designed Pot Holder] The dish drying rack utilized for placing large kitchen items, such as pots and pans, cutting boards, large plates, pot lids, etc. Convenient to drain water into the sink with swivel draining spout.
[ Large Capacity] This large dish drainer rack can place all kinds of dinnerware such as bowls, plates, pots and pans, cups, silverware, etc.

[Rustproof and Durable] The dish drying rack is made of premium metal with rustproof coated chrome finish. The extendable drainboard set has great loading capacity. Non-slip feet protect the countertop from scratch.
[Easy to Clean] The dish drying rack can be assembled in a few seconds. Detachable for easy cleaning. Movable cutlery utensil holder.
body.description: SNTD Expandable Dish Drying Rack Expand more storage space for pans and pots Expand to get pan and cutting board holder. Create valuable vertical space with this sleek-looking dish drying rack for kitchen countertop from SNTD. Combining contemporary good looks with a conveniently rotating design, the dish drainer adds some storage function in the kitchen. Dimensions: From 16.9"to 26.8" (Length) x 12.2" (Width) x 6" (Height).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Expandable Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Countertop
Dish Drying Rack Save Space for Your Kitchen Countertop

SNTD Expandable Dish Drying Rack Expand more storage space for pans and pots Expand to get pan and cutting board holder. Create valuable vertical space with this sleek-looking dish drying rack for kitchen countertop from SNTD. Combining contemporary good looks with a conveniently rotating design, the dish drainer adds some storage function in the kitchen. Dish Drying Rack Bullet Points Expand and Shrink Design Expand to get Pan Holder Fast Drain with Spout Rustproof and Durable Large Capacity Easy to Clean

Special Details Raised Holder for bottles Drying Small Bottles with Raised Holder Anti-slip Pad Anti-slip pads Provide more stability. Lock Connect Parts Lock connect parts prevent fall out when expanding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best drying rack I’ve purchased!
reviews.reviewText: The size of this is great - we can fit a sink full of dishes on this drying rack. I love that the right side can slide in when not in use so it doesn’t take up as much room. The water draining out works really well to avoid build up and water stains. This product itself is very easy to clean when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this choice
reviews.reviewText: After reviewing several dish drainers I chose this design. It works perfectly in my small space for dishes that don't make it into the dishwasher. The best part it can expand too. It has a clean look, small footprint, but strong. Happy Happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall sturdy and useful. Unstable silverware holder.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the expandability of this drainer. I love that it's fairly sturdy and I can take it apart to clean it pretty easily. The main drawbacks are 1. It's easy for the silverware holder to come loose and suddenly plummet to the floor/counter. We've had that happen more than once. It's meant to be removable, and it just sort of perches on the top crossbar. It has to be set in one particular spot so its bottom can be braced against something. 2. The metal loops sticking up on the sides of the main part seem like a natural spot to hang cups and glasses, but they are too short. No regular cups or glasses stay; they have to be set solidly on the rack or on the extension. Aside from these, it's a great dish drainer. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Drying Rack
reviews.reviewText: It's the perfect size and functionality I was looking for, so I am very happy with it!Shipping was fast and it was secured properly in the box.I highly recommend this rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is it weird to be excited about a dish drain rack? Cuz I am!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried several styles of dish racks and none were ever right. They took up too much room on my counter, and the fabric pads eventually got some mold on them since it takes awhile for them to dry.This has been the BEST dish rack that I’ve found! I love that it is expandable when needed, and has a small footprint when it’s not expanded.The drain can be positioned in different directions, runs the water off into my sink perfectly *as long as you don’t pull the trough out to its maximum*. Like another reviewer, I pulled it out to its maximum and it leaked under the rack. I pushed it in about a 1/4-1/2 inch and no leak and it still reaches my sink just fine.The rack is strong enough to hold my enameled cast iron pots and pans, so it’s strong.I never knew I could like a dish rack so much, but it has solved some frustrations I’ve had with other racks and I have more counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product ! Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy to assemble. however it lost a point because the plastic storage where you put spoons and forks falls off and is flimsy. Also the water drainage is poor. There's always a puddle of water under my dish rack and I know it's coming from the dish rack. Not even sure how to clean that little drainer thingy (it's not easy to remove and I don't want to try to remove it and end up breaking it)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dish Drying Rack
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Dish Drying Rack. It looks nice on my counter. There is a bottom piece that turns so the water makes it back into the kitchen sink, the dishes dry much faster, the bottom extends out for extra drying space, and there is also a silverware holder. The only downside is you can’t put too much in the silverware holder or it falls over. This comes pre-assembled and you can move the silverware holder to it fits on your sink.Overall I recommend. Very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the extension but it’s still small and doesn’t fit much.
the sides aren't quite tall enough for me, to hold dishes in
Good quality dish rack with the ability to expand. I use my own utensil holder as the one that is included doesn’t feel safe to use.
I like its configuration that can be extended to store lot of dishes.
This item is not as large as the photo or measurements.
